name: Callware Technologies
overview: Callware Technologies, Inc. provides voice and fax messaging solutions, and unified communication and messaging development platforms for the enterprise. It develops and markets voice and fax message handling software for small to enterprise-sized businesses; and offers Callegra .UC, an unified communication and messaging solution and an enterprise communications integration platform for integrated speech recognition, fax services, and browser based voice and fax messaging, as well as for email integration, including text-to-speech. The companyâ€™s solutions also include unified messaging modules to customize a solution for various businesses; Callegra XML Web Services SDK for unified communication and messaging; and Solo VoiceMail, a small-to-medium size office voice mail solution that enhances internal and external communication. In addition, Callware Technologies, Inc. offers a line of training and professional services. It provides solutions through a network of solution providers and authorized dealers. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Salt Lake City, Utah.
